user_id.description: A unique identifier for each user taking the Aquarium Communication Style Test.

primary_style.description: The user's primary communication style as determined by their responses. In case of a tie, the hierarchy is: Doing, People-Oriented, Planning, Visionary.

secondary_style.description: The user's secondary communication style based on their overall scoring. In case of a tie, the hierarchy is: Doing, People-Oriented, Planning, Visionary.

tertiary_style.description: The user's tertiary communication style, representing traits that are less dominant. In case of a tie, the hierarchy is: Doing, People-Oriented, Planning, Visionary.

blended_style.description: The user's blended communication style, only applicable if the scores for multiple styles are very close, specifically when classified as the 'Blended' category or any other defined blend type.

Visionary.description: The user's score for the Visionary communication style.

People-Oriented.description: The user's score for the People-Oriented communication style.

Doing.description: The user's score for the Doing communication style.

Planning.description: The user's score for the Planning communication style.

question_number.description: The number of the question answered by the user.

selected_option.description: The answer option selected by the user ('A', 'B', 'C', or 'D').

rating.description: The rating associated with the selected answer option, used for scoring purposes.

timestamp.description: The timestamp indicating when the user completed the test.
